Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
BoxHolds stream and metadata of currently parsed Box
ChunkHolds metadata for a single chunk
ChunkIndexHolds index metadata for a Fragment
DynListHolds dynamic list metadata and queue pointer
EmbeddedDataHolds embedded track data
EncryptionHolds the encryption metadata for the samples parsed from SampleEncryptionBox
ExtensionHolds the extension data parsed from UUIDBoxes
FetcherHolds the Curl multi handle and fetcher metadata
FragmentWill hold the parsed fragment data
HandleHolds the pseudofile handle for a given stream
ManifestHolds the manifest data of the opened stream
ManifestBoxHolds data and metadata for the Manifest parser
SamplePer-sample metadata
SampleDefaultHolds the default sample metadata parsed from the TfhdBox
SampleSettingsSample settings
ScreenMetricsScreen size metadata
StreamHolds stream metadata
StreamHandle
TrackTrack specific metadata
